column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName] would like to assist liege in all matters concerrning magic.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to own a tower to expand [This.GetHerHis] magic knowledge in peace and solitude.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to cure [This.GetHerHis] inability to reproduce.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] has no education in the art of personal combat and wants to change that through combat experience.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] has a meager education in the art of personal combat and wants to change that through combat experience.
While [This.GetTitledFirstName] is already well-trained in personal combat, [This.GetSheHe]'d like to take [This.GetHerHis] skills to the next level through experience in the field.

While many already consider [This.GetTitledFirstName] to be one of the more skilled fighters in the realm, [This.GetSheHe] desires true mastery of [This.GetHerHis] art, and no better way to attain such heights exists than through experience in the field.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is already well-off, but seeks a true fortune.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to swim in [This.GetHerHis] vault of gold!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to be known to all as a pious [This.GetManWoman].
[This.GetTitledFirstName] seeks to become known for [This.GetHerHis] virtues.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] seeks to become distinguished among his peers.
While already notable, [This.GetTitledFirstName] thinks [This.GetObjectPronoun] deserves true fame and glory for [This.GetHerHis] deeds.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wishes to expand his realm, by force if necessary. Gives one-time use of Conquest Casus Belli.
Won war using Conquest, Invasion or Reconquest Casus Belli
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wishes to share a close bond with someone.
Members seek to institute succession by Tanistry in [This.GetName]. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
Members seek to institute succession by Ultimogeniture in [This.GetName]. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
Members seek to lower the Crown Levy in [This.GetName]. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
Members seek to lower the Crown Obligation in [This.GetName]. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
Members seek to lower the Tolerance in [This.GetName]. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
Members seek to raise the Tolerance in [This.GetName]. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
[From.GetBestName] will improve [This.GetBestName] opinion of [From.GetHerHim]self by charming the target with a magic spell.\nPlot power doesn't affect this plot.
[From.GetBestName] will use heal spell on [This.GetBestName].\nPlot power doesn't affect this plot.
§Y[This.GetBestName]§! will lose all bad health traits except '§YStressed§!' and '§YDepressed§!'
[From.GetBestName] will use protect spell on [This.GetBestName].\nPlot power doesn't affect this plot.
§Y[This.GetBestName]§! will be able to avoid death by unnatural cause once
[From.GetBestName] wants to discredit [This.GetBestName] in front of [From.Liege.GetBestName].
[From.GetBestName] wants to defect to [This.PrimaryTitle.PrimaryTitle.GetName].\nPlot power doesn't affect this plot
